alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 3:59AM CST until February 22 at 9:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Hudspeth County in far west Texas. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Local power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will peak during the early afternoon hours on Wednesday. Areas of blowing dust will be possible, leading to lower visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County
